body_html:
Same result here, also with cuda 9.0.176, Driver Version: 384.81
So I guess I can submit a bug report to Nvidia for this problem and reference this thread?
edit: I should have looked at @thatguymike's profile

[P2P (Peer-to-Peer) GPU Bandwidth Latency Test]
Device: 0, GeForce GTX 1080 Ti, pciBusID: c, pciDeviceID: 0, pciDomainID:0
Device: 1, GeForce GTX 1080 Ti, pciBusID: d, pciDeviceID: 0, pciDomainID:0
Device=0 CAN Access Peer Device=1
Device=1 CAN Access Peer Device=0

***NOTE: In case a device doesn't have P2P access to other one, it falls back to normal memcopy procedure.
So you can see lesser Bandwidth (GB/s) in those cases.

P2P Connectivity Matrix
     D\D     0     1
     0	     1     1
     1	     1     1
Unidirectional P2P=Disabled Bandwidth Matrix (GB/s)
   D\D     0      1 
     0 345.38   6.20 
     1   6.21 352.54 
Unidirectional P2P=Enabled Bandwidth Matrix (GB/s)
Cuda failure p2pBandwidthLatencyTest.cu:105: 'the launch timed out and was terminated'

So I guess I can submit a bug report to Nvidia for this problem and reference this thread?

body:
Same result here, also with cuda 9.0.176, Driver Version: 384.81 
So I guess I can submit a bug report to Nvidia for this problem and reference this thread?
edit: I should have looked at @thatguymike's profile 
```
[P2P (Peer-to-Peer) GPU Bandwidth Latency Test]
Device: 0, GeForce GTX 1080 Ti, pciBusID: c, pciDeviceID: 0, pciDomainID:0
Device: 1, GeForce GTX 1080 Ti, pciBusID: d, pciDeviceID: 0, pciDomainID:0
Device=0 CAN Access Peer Device=1
Device=1 CAN Access Peer Device=0

***NOTE: In case a device doesn't have P2P access to other one, it falls back to normal memcopy procedure.
So you can see lesser Bandwidth (GB/s) in those cases.

P2P Connectivity Matrix
     D\D     0     1
     0	     1     1
     1	     1     1
Unidirectional P2P=Disabled Bandwidth Matrix (GB/s)
   D\D     0      1 
     0 345.38   6.20 
     1   6.21 352.54 
Unidirectional P2P=Enabled Bandwidth Matrix (GB/s)
Cuda failure p2pBandwidthLatencyTest.cu:105: 'the launch timed out and was terminated'

```
